BDSIO and BSIO: Either Bed Days Staffed and In Operation or Beds Staffed and In Operation, depending on functional centre reporting.
BDSIO: Bed Days Staffed and In Operation (Second statistical account 827*) or Bassinet Days Staffed and In Operation (Second statistical account 828*).
BSIO: Beds Staffed and In Operation (Second statistical account 825*) or Bassinets Staffed and In Operation (Second statistical account 826*).
Canadian MIS Database (CMDB), 2020–2021, Canadian Institute for Health Information.
